comments.html: Oh wow! I absolutely love this idea and I've never heard of it before. It makes the weekly list so much more appealing, which is a time scale I really struggle with. Definitely taking it!

Hi Rach,

Here's an odd but joyful thing. I was wandering around your digital garden, just pottering and enjoying an old-school decent personal website, when I stumbled upon this post.

I'm so glad you found my method useful, and thanks for the kind comments. Yep, I'm the Alastair behind the 'method' :-)

It's also great to read your site and I'll be adding you to my RSS feed reader as so much of your approach to what you put on this site resonates with me.

Lovely to have made your acquaintance!
